Trackpad:SpellAttack.NAME: Effect: Thunder
DESCRIPTIONS: Your next spell cast will deal #b

DESCRIPTIONS: For each 20 HP this enemy is missing, it gains 1 thorns.

Trackpad:ReflectionPower.NAME: Reflection
DESCRIPTIONS: After this enemy is attacked, it summons a Reflection that deals that damage instance as its intent. Reflections die after 1 turn.
